about_the_game:
The Astral Shards have been stolen and the world is on the verge of collapse! Without any heroes, it falls to you to save the world! Take up your weapons and fight your way through dangerous dungeons to return the Astral Shards and save the realm!

Sections of the world have been torn apart into mysterious rifts. It's up to you to fight and explore your way through these random dungeons filled with dangerous enemies and powerful bosses to collect the missing shards and restore the balance of the world!

Gather resources and materials from both the enemies you defeat and the environment itself to craft a powerful arsenal of weapons, brew a potent collection of potions, and learn a dazzling array of magical spells to aid you in your quest!



  • Explore Mysterious Dungeons. The world has been torn apart into separate rifts. Each one of these rifts randomly shifts each time you enter so you'll never know quite what to expect.
  • Craft Your Arsenal. Craft and Upgrade a wide array of potions and weapons to enhance your playstyle and give you great versatility in combat.
  • Test Your Skill. Put your reflexes and precision to the test against a wide variety of dungeon enemies and rift bosses!
  • Meet Eccentric Townsfolk. The villagers in town may have a few screws loose, but you wouldn't just leave them for dead would you?
